summary.para: Retrieves the specified GUID for the object.

param.name: dwGuidKind
param.para: The GUID type. Possible values are from the enumeration.

param.name: pGUID
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the GUID.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, E_POINTER, and S_OK.

summary.para: An extension to that makes is faster and easier to retrieve an object's outgoing interface IID for its default event set.
